## graph

```{r}
pH_plot <- function(data=ChemData, x, y, line= TRUE) {
if(line==TRUE){
  ggplot(aes(x= Phosphate,
             y= pH_plot()))+ ##graphing by phosphate impact on pH 
  geom_line(color= "#AD7DE8")+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth()
}
else{
  ggplot(aes(x= Phosphate,
             y= pH))+ ##graphing by phosphate impact on pH
  geom_line(color= "#AD7DE8")+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth()
}
}
pH_plot(x= Phosphate, y=pH)
```
